other.description: Units can disembark from this Transport after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge that turn.
other.name: Assault Vehicle

wargear.description: The bearer has a 5+ invulnerable save.
wargear.name: Shield dome

wargear.description: While a friendly Adeptus Astartes unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you target that unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.
wargear.name: Orbital comms array (Aura)

datasheets.fluff: Equipped with vectored thrusters that make it faster than any other gravitic tank in the Space Marines’ armouries, the Impulsor is a highly adaptable transport used by all Primaris Space Marines for rapid insertion and flanking manoeuvres. It is particularly favoured by Vanguard forces.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 storm bolters; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Impulsor
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 6 Tacticus or Phobos Infantry models. It cannot transport Jump Pack models.
wargear: This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 bellicatus missile array ◦ 1 ironhail skytalon array ◦ 1 orbital comms array ◦ 1 shield dome
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 ironhail heavy stubber ◦ 1 multi-melta
This model’s 2 storm bolters can be replaced with 2 fragstorm grenade launchers.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll, you can re-roll one Wound roll and you can re-roll one Damage roll when resolving its attacks.
other.name: Aquilon Optics

datasheets.fluff: With pinpoint accuracy, the Gladiator Lancer picks off the heaviest enemy armour, laser destroyer punching smouldering holes in their hulls. Such is the range of its heavy cannon that it can eliminate threats to the Space Marines before they encounter them, storming past burning wrecks to claim their objectives.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Lancer laser destroyer; 2 storm bolters; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Gladiator Lancer
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 Icarus rocket pod.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 ironhail heavy stubber ◦ 1 multi-melta
This model’s 2 storm bolters can be replaced with 2 fragstorm grenade launchers.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its twin las-talon that targets the closest eligible Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
other.name: Ferocious Assault

datasheets.fluff: The Valiant lays down blistering volleys of fire as it escorts transports or supports infantry in ferocious fighting, crossing rushing watercourses, sucking marshlands and bubbling lava lakes with equal ease. Its twin las-talons spit death at the foe, making short work of enemy armour and cracking open fortified positions.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 multi-meltas; twin las-talon; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Gladiator Valiant
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 Icarus rocket pod.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 ironhail heavy stubber ◦ 1 multi-melta

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: This model’s twin heavy onslaught gatling cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability when targeting Infantry units.
other.name: Rotating Death

datasheets.fluff: When the cannons of the Gladiator Reaper spin to full pitch, the droning makes the teeth of all nearby itch with the intensity of the vibrations. Within seconds, thousands of spent casings pour over the battle tank’s armoured hide as enemies are erased from existence by the storm of fire.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 tempest bolters; twin heavy onslaught gatling cannon; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Gladiator Reaper
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 Icarus rocket pod.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 ironhail heavy stubber ◦ 1 multi-melta

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.
other.name: Executioner

datasheets.fluff: Based on the Repulsor chassis, the Repulsor Executioner sacrifices some transport capacity to accommodate powerful turret weaponry. Even the largest battle tanks can be crippled by the beam of a heavy laser destroyer, while the incinerating blasts of a macro plasma incinerator can obliterate infantry formations.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy onslaught gatling cannon; macro plasma incinerator; Repulsor Executioner defensive array; twin heavy bolter; twin Icarus ironhail heavy stubber; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Repulsor Executioner
datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 6 Adeptus Astartes Infantry models. Each Jump Pack, Gravis or Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models and each Centurion model takes up the space of 3 models.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 Icarus rocket pod.
This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 ironhail heavy stubber ◦ 1 multi-melta
This model’s macro plasma incinerator can be replaced with 1 heavy laser destroyer.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move, you can select one Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge. Provided that unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and every model in that unit is within 3" of this Transport, it can embark within this Transport. The charging unit can then select new targets for its charge.
other.name: Emergency Combat Embarkation

datasheets.fluff: Clad in advanced armour plating and armed for any battlefield situation, the Repulsor not only transports its passengers safely, it also provides superb fire support. Dangerous terrain is little impediment to it, its ventral plates channelling gravitic energies that crush obstacles beneath the vehicle’s mass.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy onslaught gatling cannon; hunter-slayer missile; Repulsor defensive array; twin heavy bolter; armoured hull.
datasheets.name: Black Templars Repulsor

abilities.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.
abilities.name: One Shot

datasheets.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Adeptus Astartes Infantry models. Each Jump Pack, Gravis or Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models and each Centurion model takes up the space of 3 models.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 multi-melta.
This model’s heavy onslaught gatling cannon can be replaced with 1 las-talon.
This model’s twin heavy bolter can be replaced with 1 twin lascannon.

other.description: In your Command phase, if this unit contains one or more Cenobyte Servitor models, select one Relics of the Emperor Ascendant ability (see left). Until the start of your next Command phase, this unit’s Chaplain Grimaldus model has that ability.
other.name: Temple Relics

other.description: While Chaplain Grimaldus is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
other.name: Litanies of the Devout

abilities.description: Improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in this unit by 1.
abilities.name: Sceptre of Anointing

abilities.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
abilities.name: Remnant of the Fallen Temple

abilities.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.
abilities.name: Banner of Fallen Crusaders

datasheets.fluff: High Chaplain Grimaldus is a beacon of Imperial faith. His fortitude is such that many of his brothers believe him invincible. His will is singular, his zeal coldly furious, and his martial skill attested by the trail of broken foes laid at his heels. His Cenobyte Servitors lurch to war at his side, bearing with them holy relics of the faith.
datasheets.leader: This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ Assault Intercessor Squad ■ Infernus Squad ■ Intercessor Squad ■ Primaris Crusader Squad ■ Primaris Sword Brethren
datasheets.loadout:
Chaplain Grimaldus is equipped with: plasma pistol; artificer crozius.
Every Cenobyte Servitor is equipped with: close combat weapon.
datasheets.name: Chaplain Grimaldus
wargear: None

other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.
other.name: High Marshal

other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit and each time an attack is made with such a weapon, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
other.name: Crusade of Wrath

datasheets.fluff: Helbrecht is the living embodiment of his Chapter’s warrior spirit. Wielding the Sword of the High Marshals, he storms into the fray, bellowing oaths of vengeance as he leads the unstoppable charge. His battle-brothers follow him without question, for they believe where High Marshal Helbrecht treads, so too walks the Emperor himself.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Assault Intercessor Squad ■ Intercessor Squad ■ Primaris Crusader Squad ■ Primaris Sword Brethren
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Ferocity; Sword of the High Marshals.

profiles.name: Sword of the High Marshals – One-handed
Sword of the High Marshals – Two-handed

datasheets.name: High Marshal Helbrecht
wargear: None

other.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Character unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.
other.name: Sigismund’s Heir

other.description: Once per phase, when a melee attack is allocated to this model and the saving throw is failed, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.
other.name: Skilful Parry

datasheets.fluff: A humble warrior touched by greatness, the Emperor’s Champion strides to battle wreathed in divine light. The furious blows of the enemy ring from his nigh-impenetrable Armour of Faith. In return, the Emperor’s Champion seeks out the leaders of the foe and, with sweeping blows from his Black Sword, strikes them down.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Assault Intercessor Squad ■ Intercessor Squad ■ Primaris Crusader Squad ■ Primaris Sword Brethren ■ Sternguard Veteran Squad
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Black Sword.
datasheets.name: The Emperor’s Champion
wargear: None

other.description: Once per battle round, you can target one unit from your army with this ability with a Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if another unit from your army has already been targeted by that Stratagem this phase.
other.name: Rites of Battle

other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
other.name: Finest Hour

datasheets.fluff: Each Black Templars crusade is led by a Marshal. Similar in rank to the Captains of other Chapters, Marshals are fearsome combatants and paragons of strategic acumen. Ensuring a crusade’s purity and success is a sacred duty, and Marshals fight with sanctified relic weapons while acting as beacons of pious fervour for their warriors.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Assault Intercessor Squad ■ Infernus Squad ■ Intercessor Squad ■ Primaris Crusader Squad ■ Primaris Sword Brethren ■ Sternguard Veteran Squad
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: plasma pistol; master-crafted power weapon.
datasheets.name: Marshal
wargear: This model’s plasma pistol can be replaced with one combi-weapon.

other.description: This model’s unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
other.name: Target Priority

other.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
other.name: Tactical Precision

datasheets.fluff: A Castellan leads each of a crusade’s Fighting Companies and acts as a conduit for their Marshal’s will. Charged with the physical and spiritual purity of active Chapter Keeps, they have honed a patient wisdom that they draw upon in battle, alongside their tactical precision and close-quarters ferocity.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Assault Intercessor Squad ■ Infernus Squad ■ Intercessor Squad ■ Primaris Crusader Squad ■ Primaris Sword Brethren ■ Sternguard Veteran Squad You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Captain or Chapter Master model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Captain or Chapter Master model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: combi-weapon; master-crafted power weapon.
datasheets.name: Castellan
wargear: This model’s combi-weapon can be replaced with 1 heavy bolt pistol.
This model’s master-crafted power weapon can be replaced with 1 Astartes chainsword.

other.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.
other.name: Righteous Zeal

special.description: If a Character from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to an Intercessor Squad, it can be attached to this unit instead.
special.name: Attached Unit

datasheets.fluff: Infused with the posthuman might of the Primaris miracle, these Crusader Squads storm into battle with bolt rifles blazing and Astartes chainswords howling. Initiates aim jets of fire from their pyreblasters or swing crackling power fists into their foes, while hard-eyed Neophytes fight furiously to prove their martial worth.
datasheets.loadout: The Primaris Sword Brother is equipped with: heavy bolt pistol; power weapon.
datasheets.name: Primaris Crusader Squad
wargear: Any number of Primaris Initiates can each have their bolt rifle replaced with 1 heavy bolt pistol and 1 Astartes chainsword.
Any number of Primaris Neophytes can each have their bolt pistol and Astartes chainsword replaced with 1 Neophyte firearm and 1 close combat weapon.
For every 10 models in this unit, up to 2 Primaris Initiates can each have their bolt rifle replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 heavy bolt pistol and 1 power fist ◦ 1 pyreblaster
The Primaris Sword Brother’s heavy bolt pistol can be replaced with 1 pyre pistol.

other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one of the following effects to apply to melee weapons equipped by models in this unit until the end of the phase: ■ Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those weapons. ■ Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons.
other.name: Vow-sworn Bladesmen

special.description: If a Character from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to an Intercessor Squad, it can be attached to this unit instead.
special.name: Attached Unit

datasheets.fluff: Every Sword Brother has earned their place amongst the Marshal’s household through acts of unswerving faith and spectacular violence. On the battlefield they are a reaping whirlwind, unstoppable, uncompromising and armed with a lethal assortment of weapons that they turn upon the enemy in the Emperor’s name.
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: heavy bolt pistol; Astartes chainsword.
datasheets.name: Primaris Sword Brethren
wargear: Any number of Primaris Sword Brothers can each have their Astartes chainsword replaced with 1 power weapon.
For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Primaris Sword Brother’s Astartes chainsword can be replaced with 1 thunder hammer.
For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Primaris Sword Brother’s heavy bolt pistol and Astartes chainsword can be replaced with 1 twin lightning claws.
For every 5 models in this unit, 1 Primaris Sword Brother’s heavy bolt pistol can be replaced with 1 plasma pistol.
For every 5 models in this unit, up to 2 Primaris Sword Brothers can each have their heavy bolt pistol replaced with 1 pyre pistol.

The Sword Brother Castellan’s heavy bolt pistol and Astartes chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 combi-weapon and 1 Astartes chainsword. ◦ 1 combi-weapon and 1 master-crafted power weapon. ◦ 1 heavy bolt pistol and 1 master-crafted power weapon.

other.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit. Before selecting targets for this weapon, select one of its profiles to make attacks with.
other.name: Righteous Zeal

special.description: If a Character from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a Tactical Squad, it can be attached to this unit instead.
special.name: Attached Unit

datasheets.fluff: Mingling Initiates and their Neophyte charges, led by a battle-tempered Sword Brother, Crusader Squads combine maniacal zeal with the posthuman might of the Adeptus Astartes. Often equipped for the close-quarters fighting style favoured by the Black Templars, they carry their crusade into the heart of enemy lines.
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: boltgun; bolt pistol; close combat weapon.
datasheets.name: Crusader Squad
wargear: 1 Initiate’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 flamer ◦ 1 plasma gun ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 grav-gun

1 Initiate’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 power weapon ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 heavy bolter ◦ 1 heavy flamer ◦ 1 grav-cannon ◦ 1 lascannon ◦ 1 missile launcher ◦ 1 multi-melta ◦ 1 plasma cannon
Any number of Initiates can each have their boltgun replaced with 1 Astartes chainsword.
Any number of Neophytes can each have their boltgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Astartes shotgun ◦ 1 combat knife

The Sword Brother’s bolt pistol and boltgun can be replaced with 1 twin lightning claws or two different weapons from the following list:** ◦ 1 Astartes chainsword ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 boltgun ◦ 1 combi-weapon ◦ 1 grav-pistol ◦ 1 hand flamer ◦ 1 inferno pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol ◦ 1 power fist ◦ 1 power weapon ◦ 1 storm bolter ◦ 1 thunder hammer  ** This model can only be equipped with two ranged weapons if one of them is a Pistol (and it can only have one Pistol).

enhancements.description: ■ The bearer’s ranged weapons have the [PRECISION], [ANTI-PSYKER 4+] and [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] abilities. ■ If the Abhor the Witch, Destroy the Witch vow is active for your army, each time the bearer makes a ranged attack that targets a Psyker unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
enhancements.name: WITCHSEEKER BOLTS

enhancements.description: ■ Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1. ■ If the Suffer Not the Unclean to Live vow is active for your army, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons as well.
enhancements.name: PERDITION’S EDGE

enhancements.description: ■ Improve the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1. ■ While the bearer is leading a unit, if the Accept Any Challenge, No Matter the Odds vow is active for your army, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
enhancements.name: SIGISMUND’S SEAL

enhancements.description: ■ Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, halve the Damage characteristic of that attack. ■ While the bearer is leading a unit, if the Uphold the Honour of the Emperor vow is active for your army, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
enhancements.name: TÄNNHAUSER’S BONES

stratagems.effect:
Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result
if the Accept Any Challenge, No Matter
the Odds vow is active for your army. On
a 4+, that enemy unit cannot Fall Back
this phase and must Remain Stationary.
Otherwise, that enemy unit can Fall Back
this phase, but if it does, all models in that
unit must take a Desperate Escape test.
stratagems.fluff:
Glowing blades and revving chainswords
close off the foe’s every avenue of escape.
stratagems.name: NO ESCAPE
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes unit from
your army that is within Engagement
Range of that enemy unit.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Movement phase,
when an enemy unit (excluding Vehicles
and Monsters) is selected to Fall Back.

stratagems.effect:
Select one Templar Vow that is
not active for your army. Until the start
of your next Command phase, while that
Character is leading a unit, models in
that unit gain the benefits of that vow in
addition to the vow selected to be active
for your army at the start of the battle.
stratagems.fluff:
The magnetic force of this Black Templar’s
oratory inspires his fellow warriors to
swear great vows, even in the midst of
the battle.
stratagems.name: FERVENT ACCLAMATION
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes
Character unit from your army.

stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time a model in your unit is destroyed,
if that model has not fought this phase,
roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if the
Uphold the Honour of the Emperor vow
is active for your army. On a 4+, do not
remove the destroyed model from play; it
can fight after the attacking model’s unit
has finished making its attacks, and is
then removed from play.
stratagems.fluff:
Every blow struck against a Black Templar
is answered in kind. Even as they are
laid low, their blades still lash out at the
enemies of the divine Emperor.
stratagems.name: VICIOUS RIPOSTE
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes unit
from your army that was selected as the
target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when:
Fight phase, just after an enemy
unit has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time a model in your unit makes a melee
attack, improve the Armour Penetration
characteristic of that attack by 1. If the
Suffer Not The Unclean to Live vow is
active for your army, add 1 to the Strength
characteristic of that attack as well.
stratagems.fluff:
The Black Templars channel their fervour
into a hate-fuelled flurry of blows.
stratagems.name: CRUSADER'S WRATH
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes unit from
your army that has not been selected to
fight this phase.

stratagems.effect:
Until the end of the phase, each
time an attack targets your unit, worsen
the Armour Penetration characteristic of
that attack by 1.
stratagems.fluff:
The belligerency and transhuman
physiologies of the Adeptus Astartes make
them unyielding foes.
stratagems.name: ARMOUR OF CONTEMPT
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes unit
from your army that was selected as the
target of one or more of the attacking
unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase or
the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit
has selected its targets.

stratagems.effect:
Your unit can make a Normal
move of up to D6", but it must end that
move closer to the enemy unit that just
shot. If the Abhor the Witch, Destroy the
Witch vow is active for your army, your
unit can make a Normal move of up to 6"
instead, but it must end that move either
closer to the enemy unit that just shot, or
closer to the closest enemy Psyker unit.
stratagems.fluff:
With a zealous cry, the Black Templars
press forward towards victory.
stratagems.name: DEVOUT PUSH
stratagems.target:
One Adeptus Astartes unit
from your army that had one or more of
its models destroyed as a result of the
attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when:
Your opponent’s Shooting phase,
just after an enemy unit has shot.
